dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1300 : To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Wildlife Refuge System volunteer, community partnership, and education programs
section.text: Section 7(g) of the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 (16 U.S.C. 742f(g)) is amended by striking 2011 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2017.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 30, 2013.
